title: BeautyPlus - Easy Photo Editor & Selfie Camera
description:
800 million selfies edited by BeautyPlus? What? Find out why 300 million choose BeautyPlus to edit their selfies, pictures and videos every single month. Here's a hint: BeautyPlus offers simple, yet powerful photo editing tools, artistic effects, augmented reality (AR) filters and so much more to take your selfie game to the next level. So, let's get ready to post the best selfie to your social media account!
 
Spread some Christmas cheer with the powerful selfie editing feature of BeautyPlus and have some fun with the cute filters.
 
Creating beautiful and natural looking photo and video selfies has never been easier. With BeautyPlus you can erase acne marks, smooth skin, brighten eyes, whiten teeth, edit eye color, add filters and special effects, blur photos and so much more.
 
It‚Äôs our little secret!
BeautyPlus has worked with well-known makeup artists, photographers and real people just like you to develop the perfect photo editing app - a tool that is both easy to use and gives flawless selfies. Selfie edits are so subtle no one will ever suspect you‚Äôve used an app, allowing you to show off your natural beauty without harsh filters.
 
Skin Editor
+ Beauty camera adds a radiant complexion for perfect face and selfie pictures
+ Retouch skin tone using our exclusive skin smoothing makeover tool
+ Blemish remover lets you make pimples and other skin problems disappear with just a tap
 
Perfect Eyes
+ Erase bags and dark circles beneath your eyes
+ Brighten eyes and make them pop in photos
+ Edit eye color to match your hair color and hairstyle using custom contacts
 
Create The Perfect Smile
+ Beauty editor with teeth whitening brings out the natural beauty in your smile
+ Take a perfect selfie with a clean smile every time
 
Live Auto-Retouch (NEW!!!)
Need to do a quick retouch? Let our selfie editor do the work for you! Retouch using multiple special effects, and instantly preview your photo or video live in BeautyPlus. Pick the one you want and take your flawless photo or video with just one click and flaunt it on your social media account.
 
Magic Brush
Give your selfies and photos a fantastic new look with our unique effect brushes: Glow, Neon, Stars, Hearts and so much more to satisfy your imagination about funny selfie. Enjoy finger painting with numerous colors!
 
Professional Photo Editing
+ Blur: Selfies instantly take on a professional look with a quick blur. Just swipe to apply the effect!
+ Crop: The perfect selfie and photo is just one crop away! Tap to resize and trim
+ Photo Filters: From the romantic to the dramatic, we have dozens of special filters to make your selfies and pictures pop
+ Professional Control: Enlarge, Stretch, Slim and Rotate features give you the freedom to edit your selfies and photos the way you want!
 
Additional Features
+ Selfies aren‚Äôt everything - BeautyPlus works with both the front-facing and outer-facing camera
+ Selfie Timer built in so you can get off the perfect hands-free shot
+ Multiple face recognition lets you go for the group shot!
+ Perfect lighting even in the darkest locations. Low light? No problem! BeautyPlus automatically adjusts exposure
+ Ready for sharing. When you are done editing, you can share to popular social sites like Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, and Snapchat! 
 
Share your photos (and feedback) with us!
‚Ä¢ Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/beautypluscom

  
Device Compatibility
The vast majority of all BeautyPlus tools and features will function on most devices. However, our AR filters require storage space of at least 1GB and a minimum resolution of 480x854; if your device does not meet these specifications then the AR filters will not be available.

title: Beautiful Widgets Pro
description:
Beautiful Widgets is your best companion when personalizing your home screen with widgets.
Be unique, express yourself.

Thanks to its multiple customizable widgets and themes in the Play Store, you can customize your home screen according to your moods and desires with clocks, widgets and weather. You can also view the current weather and the forecasted weather with beautiful animations.

Beautiful Widgets was the first application to achieve one million paid downloads.  It was listed as ‚ÄúGoogle Editor‚Äôs choice‚Äù for more than one year and has been listed as one of  the top 10 paid applications in the Google Play Store for more than 4 years now.

Just like 4 million other beautiful widgets users, take advantage of comprehensive weather forecast information and the HD version of your other favorite clock widgets, weather widgets, compatible with phones and tablets.


Principal functionalities:
-	Complete clocks widgets (time, date, alarm, etc.)
-	Multiple widgets (6x4, 6x1 and 6x2 only for tablets)
-	Download as many themes as you like to customize your widgets
-	Main weather forecast information for your current location and all preferred cities
-	Weather notifications from around the world, unlock animations or interactive screensavers (DayDream)
-	Interactive weather wallpaper
-       Toggles widgets
-       Weather animations

For more information, visit the website:   http://levelupstudio.com

Important information:
-	This application cannot be stored on the SD card due to the widgets
-	We do not guarantee operation on Roms and alternative Homepages
-	DayDream is only available for Android 4.2


*** Permissions ***
- Location : for geolocated forecast
- SDCard : to save the themes
- Wifi, Bluetooth, System tools : for toggle widgets
- Affects battery : for updates
- Alarm : to display the next alarm

PressureNet SDK allow us to gather barometric data to predict a better forecasting and to help researchers.

*** Important ***
We allow more than 15 minutes for the refund policy because we think it is too short. You can contact us from Google Checkout within 24 hours with an explanation on why you are not interested in keeping it. Warning: this do not apply during sales and promotions!

comments: I have had this app for years. It worked on my Samsung 3, 7 and 8. I just upgraded to 10 and now time does not display properly...it shows random times. When I go to settings it is correct, and go back to home screen and it is fine until the next time my phone goes to sleep. PLEASE FIX. I loved it for years and paid for the app, and wish to continue using it.

I have purchased this app a while ago. My phone upgraded to Android Version 10. Since the upgrade the time does stay current. All other functions seem to work fine. Please fix the time. It does not sync and stay up to date. I quit using this app. I really love this app and would like to use it again. Please fix the time sync issue. - Long term BW Pro User

I purchased this a long time ago. It was great. But now for about 9 months it freezes and the time never changes unless I access the settings or restart my phone. I haven't mentioned it until now because a UNINSTALL reinstall would fix it but for only a few days or weeks. Now I'm just sick and tired of uninstalling the clock app that no longer keeps time. Apps are not like cars. If they quit working people deserve a refund. I'm using a Galaxy A50. Is there a fix or what?

I used to have an app called HD Widgets and it worked wonderfully thru 3 Android phones. And was free. Now I have to get another phone and I can't find it on Google Play any more. So I get this POS and actually PAID for it. It won't keep time or weather, can't change the skin,etc. Avoid this author ...

I used to LOVE this app when it was HD Widgets. Have used the app across 2-3 phones. I loved the versatility of the appearance and settings I could acheive. Now I can get the same appearance but a few things are causing problems now. Sometimes the display takes forever to load on my phone where I rarely ever had a problem with it loading. The other problem is the Time will not work correctly. If you restart the app the time will be on point, after a minute the time will not continue working. I have tried the battery in the background permission fix and it does not work. I would continue to use the app, actually I would prefer to use it compared to what I have had to use in it's place, but it needs to be fixed as it just drives me crazy seeing the time on the clock not changing to the correct time.

title: Beautiful Widgets Free
description:
Beautiful Widgets is your best companion when personalizing your home screen.
Be unique, express yourself.

Thanks to its multiple customizable widgets and themes in the Play Store, you can customize your home screen according to your moods and desires.


Unlock the Beautiful Widgets option      FREE!  Use GetJar Gold to discover new applications and use them to extend the functionality of Beautiful Widgets.  In-app purchase with the Google Play Store is also possible.


Beautiful Widgets was the first application to achieve one million paid downloads.  It was listed as ‚ÄúGoogle Editor‚Äôs choice‚Äù for more than one year and has been listed as one of  the top 10 paid applications in the Google Play Store for more than 4 years now.

Just like 4 million other users, take advantage of comprehensive weather forecast information and the HD version  of your other favorite widgets, compatible with phones and tablets.


Basic functionalities:
-	Complete clocks (time, date, alarm, etc.)
-	Multiple widgets (6x4, 6x1, and 6x2 only for tablets)
-	More than 2,500 themes
-	Main weather forecast information for your preferred city

Explore further and unlock the advanced functionalities:
-	Weather forecasts for as many cities as you wish
-	Complementary weather information from Weather Underground or Accuweather
-	Weather notifications from around the world, unlock animations or interactive screensavers (DayDream)


For more information, visit the website:   http://www.beautiful-widgets.com

Important information:
-	This application cannot be stored on the SD card due to the widgets
-	We do not guarantee operation on Roms and alternative Homepages
-	DayDream is only available for Android 4.2


*** Permissions ***
- Location : for geolocated forecast
- SDCard : to save the themes
- Wifi, Bluetooth, System tools : for toggle widgets
- Affects battery : for updates
- Alarm : to display the next alarm

PressureNet SDK allow us to gather barometric data to predict a better forecasting and to help researchers.

*** Important ***
We allow more than 15 minutes for the refund policy because we think it is too short. You can contact us from Google Checkout within 24 hours with an explanation on why you are not interested in keeping it. Warning: this do not apply during sales and promotions!

They've clearly taken their money and run. screwing over anyone who invested. Update Jan 2020: Still no fix. Stay away from this faulty scam of an app.

There's some mischief going on here. I have been a longtime user of Beautiful Widgets Pro until I took a look at the last update date - 2016. I installed and logged into this and still I'm asked to pay once again for pro features that I long paid for. And not just once, but twice - the first time to unlock Pro features (BW+) in their words and a second time to remove adverts. Did I say mischief? The right word is highway robbery.

How long until Google gets their head out of their cars and realizes that the level up studio using beautiful widgets as a scam I thought Google was better than this allowing it to happen, dead it appears there on the take. for the first version happy except was never updated past 2016 now this new version requires you to pay again for the same app and now it no longer updates and it asks you to pay for a second time that's twice in this app in order to move remove adds. Criminal

comments: I love this app! It's amazing! But one thing I would like to point out is about the facial shape. The camera automatically changes the shape or your facial features to match a perfect face, and whenever I take it off, it makes me feel uncomfortable in my own skin, like I need to change myself.

I love the filters on this app, but there really needs to be a permanent switch to allow users to flip off this "face correcting" filter. I like my face shape the way it is, and I would like to keep it that way. Please add this feature. I really want to like this app, but I can't stand having it forcibly change the way my face is shaped!

title: Beautiful Photo Frames
description:
Want to create beautiful framed photos and share those via social media? Beautiful Photo Frames helps you do that in seconds! Install it, snap or use an existing photo, add a frame and that's it, the photo is ready to be shared.

Are you in a romantic mood and want to surprise your significant other? Create and send a romantic photo, framed with red roses or love symbols with just a few taps.
Or maybe you want to create a photo card for a major event in someone's life (i.e. birthday cards, wedding invitations, ...)? Nothing easier, it‚Äôs as simple as picking one of the many frames available, match it with your photo and Voil√†, ready to be shared!

The possibilities are endless with "Beautiful Photo Frames", as long as you want to share a personalized photo you will find the perfect frame for it. You'll also be able to preview the end-result in real time, even before snapping the photo. This gives you the power to create the perfect framed photo and when you're happy with the result to share it with friends & family. If you love your creation you can even use it as your default wallpaper.

These are some of the main features "Beautiful Photo Frames" includes:

‚òÖ Beautiful photo frames. No matter the idea you have, you'll find a picture frame that suits your needs. 26 vivid pic frames, from romantic to professional, give you a wide range of choices. Enhance your photos with beautiful HD templates.
‚òÖ Snap photos or use existing. Add frames to existing photos from your gallery or simply snap a new photo with a live framed preview. Once in the frame, the photo can be scaled, zoomed, rotated and moved to fit exactly the way you want.
‚òÖ Photo effects. There are more than 20 effects you can apply to the framed photo. From the usual color/brightness/contrast effects, to special ones such as sepia, you can fine-tune the resulting photo until it looks exactly as you intended.
‚òÖ Apply stickers. Want to give the photo a touch of fun? There are literally hundreds of stickers you can apply to the edited photo. Grouped in dozens of categories, from funny hair styles/eyes/ears to those used for celebrations or love, you can find any type of clipart.
‚òÖ Add photo captions. You can add your own personalized text and create a virtual card for any occasion. The app includes a full text editor with all the font tools you'd need to apply a great looking photo caption.
‚òÖ Share photos. All the framed photos are saved and managed in the app's own gallery. From there it is very easy to select one and share it via social media (Twitter, Facebook, Instagram and many others). Let your friends admire your creations!

With "Beautiful Photo Frames" you are able to enhance your photos from simple images to frame-worthy artistic creations. You are just one Install-tap away from creating unforgettable framed photos. Once installed the app doesn't need an Internet connection anymore, since all picture frames and stickers are included.

We're eager to make this app your one-stop when you need a photo framing solution so if there are any features you'd like included in future versions let us know. Any feedback is welcome so either contact us or leave your review.

title: Beautiful Roses
description:
The rose is a classic flower that is used to celebrate countless occasions. From receiving a single red rose from your first love, to giving mom a bouquet of pink roses to tell her thank you on Mother‚Äôs Day, there are different rose colors that are used to express different meanings.

Red roses are known as the ultimate symbol of love and romance. Pink roses of all hues ranging from light pinks to fuchsia, represent admiration and gratitude, and are the perfect way to say thank you. Orange roses symbolize enthusiasm and passion and sends a message of excitement. White roses represent purity and innocence and can also represent reverence for a loved one.

Since it‚Äôs so easy to incorporate roses into life‚Äôs most memorable moments, why not celebrate everyday with roses? title: LOOKS - Real Makeup Camera
description:
The best makeup selfie camera, LOOKS!

1. Makeup featuring brand collaboration
Try on signature makeup styles from top brands!

2. Personal makeup and color options
Find the makeup style and skin tone color that best suit you.

3. Natural beauty adjustments
See how subtle, natural changes to your facial contours can refine your appearance.

Tips for getting the most from LOOKS
- To ensure a realistic and natural effect, wipe the camera lens clean before shooting.
- If the makeup looks too thick, tap the makeup icon once more to adjust its intensity.
- A long press on the screen in camera mode lets you compare your face with and without makeup.
